sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_status_effects"> <x_176383_star_wars_status_effects action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>A disoriented character adds a setback die to all checks he makes. Most effects that disorient a character last for a set duration. If a set duration is not specified, disorientation lasts until the end of the character's next turn. If a character is disoriented multiple times, each instance increases the total duration of the effect by the instance's specified duration, but may not increase the total duration beyond the scop eof the present encounter.</description> <name>Disoriented</name> <number>SE0001003</number> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-06-29 15:31:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8821a9652f413050e0f497eef699b6f3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-06-29 15:31:29</sys_updated_on> </x_176383_star_wars_status_effects> </record_update>
